revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Roku |model=Ultra |revision=(4660X2) |asin=B07HDHXZH4 |price=100 |est_release_date=10/08/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=media streamer |fcc_id=TC2-R1016 |fcc_date=10/02/2017 |ic_id=5959A-R1016 |flags=HDMI 2.2, 4k, HDR, MicroSD, |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF4G28AC |ram1=1024 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB256M16BP-FL |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB, MicroSD card slot, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8812BU |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} :{{ProductPage|https://www.roku.com/products/roku-ultra}}
This is the second generation Roku Ultra, sometimes referred to as the 2018 model. It comes with a Enhanced Voice Remote with TV power and volume buttons.
<!--{{FCC ST|03/29/2018|indexme.}} -->"Bryan REV.03 GP 2000000108-03" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The ID of the Wi-Fi radio chip is not clear but the specs and size seem to suggest that it is a RTL8812BU.
